field.name: Eyebrow
field.description: Add an eyebrow text (Go to styling to change the size)

field.name: Title
field.description: Add a title (Go to styling to change the size)

field.name: Subtitle
field.description: Add a subtitle (Go to styling to change the size)

field.name: Text
field.description: Add a text

field.name: Link
field.description: Add a button link

field.name: Label
field.description: Button label is only visible if there is a button link

Parameter.name: Use focal point selector for images

field.name: Style
field.description: Select a button style

field.name: Link
field.description: Add a button link

field.name: Label
field.description: Button label is only visible if there is a button link

Parameter.name: Use focal point selector for images

field.name: Style
field.description: Select a button style

field.name: Theme
field.description: Select a theme (background and text color) to style the content

field.name: Text alignment
field.description: Select between left, center and right aligned text

field.name: Text readability
field.description: Having the right amount of characters on each line is key to readability. This setting is activated by default and will shorten the number of characters on each line. We encourage you to have it on if you find yourself having to move your neck/head to read the text in a single column. Otherwise, disable it and the text will then be limited by the column width.

field.name: Eyebrow heading level
field.description: Select the desired heading level. This will only affect the tag around the title, not the styling or font size. This also help you get better SEO. If you select Auto, h2 will be used.

field.name: Eyebrow size
field.description: Do you want to make your title font size smaller or larger? Select a font size for well-sized content

field.name: Eyebrow css class
field.description: Use Bootstrap utility classes (seperated by space) https://getbootstrap.com/docs/5.1/utilities/spacing/

field.name: Title heading level
field.description: Select the desired heading level. This will only affect the tag around the title, not the styling or font size. This also help you get better SEO. If you select Auto, h2 will be used.

field.name: Title size
field.description: Do you want to make your title font size smaller or larger? Select a font size for well-sized content

field.name: Title css class
field.description: Use Bootstrap utility classes (seperated by space) https://getbootstrap.com/docs/5.1/utilities/spacing/

field.name: Subtitle size
field.description: Do you want to make your title font size smaller or larger? Select a font size for well-sized content

field.name: Subtitle css class
field.description: Use Bootstrap utility classes (seperated by space) https://getbootstrap.com/docs/5.1/utilities/spacing/

field.name: Text size
